html.q: What does HTML stand for?
html.fb: All the other acronyms do not exist, it is a markup language.

html.q: What is the largest heading in HTML?
html.fb: Headings range from <h1> to <h6> the lower the number the more important the heading.

html.q: Which tag is used to create an ordered list?
html.fb: <ol> stands for ordered list, <ul> is unordered list and <li> is used to list the items.

html.q: Type in below the correct tag for creating a hyperlink
html.fb: <a> is the main way to define a hyperlink.

html.q: What is the correct way to create a table
html.fb: <table> is the way to initiate a table and <t> is not a tag that exist. <td> is used to enter table data and <tr> is to define rows in the table.

html.q: Which tag is used for adding videos to a website?
html.fb: This was tricky, but <media>, <movie>, and <vid> doesn't exist as a tag.

html.q: How is a HTML5 document initialized?
html.fb: Other tags like <html> is used to start a HTML file, but to initialize the entire document use <!DOCTYPE html>

html.q: Which tag is used for adding sound to a website?
html.fb: <media>, <sound>, <mp3> all doesn't exist.

html.q: What is the correct way to make the text bold?
html.fb: <b> stands for bold, but <bold> is not a tag, while <em> is used to italicize words and <imp> doesn't exist.

html.q: What character is used to close a tag?
html.fb: Use / to close a tag.

html.q: What HTML element is used to inserting a line break?
html.fb: is short for break.

html.q: What is the HTML element used for creating a bullet list?
html.fb: <ul> is an unordered list.

html.q: What HTML attribute is used to define inline-styles directly on HTML element?
html.fb: Only use style to define styles in a HTML file.

html.q: How can you add a comment in HTML?
html.fb: <!-- and --> is the way to leave a comment on HTML.

html.q: Select the correct way to create a checkbox field.
html.fb: <input type="checkbox"> is the correct way to create a checkbox field.

html.q: How many different headings are there?
html.fb: Headings range from <h1> to <h6>.

html.q: Select the correct HTML syntax for creating a text input.
html.fb: <input type="textfield"> is the correct way.

html.q: Which is the correct way to set a background color for the HTML page?
html.fb: style=background-color is the correct way to set a background color for the HTML page.

html.q: Enter below the correct tag to use when implementing JavaScript in HTML.
html.fb: <script> is correct way to implement JavaScript in the HTML file.

html.q: Which is the correct way to put a picture on the HTML page?
html.fb: is correct way to add pictures.

java.q: Type in the correct method to output something in Java?
java.fb: println() displays the things that you are trying to print.

java.q: What is the correct data type to store text?
java.fb: String is the correct way, make sure it the 'S' is capitalized. The uncapitlize is used in C++.

java.q: Which is the correct way to declare an array?
java.fb: Arrays are declared with '[]', '()' are used in methods and '{}' are used for classes.

java.q: Which variable is used to store integers?
java.fb: int is used for integers and String is used for collection of characters. Boolean is used for true or false.

java.q: What is another way of writing the notation x=x+2
java.fb: += is used to add the variable with the value while the returned store as the variable.

java.q: What keyword is used to return a value in a method?
java.fb: return is used in a method to return the value.

java.q: What keyword is used to stop a loop?
java.fb: break stops the loop.

java.q: What is import used for?

c1.c: To import a package from Java API library

java.fb: import is used to access the Java API library and import it into the java file.

java.q: What operator is used to compare two numeric values?
java.fb: == is used to compare two numeric values.

java.q: What method is used to find the size of a String?
java.fb: length() is used to return the size of the String.

java.q: What is the method .equals() used for?

c2.c: To set a String to a variable

java.fb: .equals() is used to compare two String instances.

java.q: What operator is used to add two values together?
java.fb: + is used to add.

java.q: Which method can be used to return a string in upper case letters?
java.fb: toUpperCase() is the only valid method in Java.

java.q: Array indexes start with
java.fb: Array start at position 0 due to the off by one error.

java.q: What is the correct way to create a method?
java.fb: name() is the correct way to create a method, methodName[] would be an array.

java.q: What operator is used to end each line of code?
java.fb: ; closes out each line of code.

java.q: What is the correct way to create an object called myObj of myClass?
java.fb: Class goes first then object name and then call the class.

java.q: Which method can be used to find the highest value between x and y?
java.fb: Math.max() is the correct method that is part of the default java library.

java.q: Which operator is used to multiple numbers?
java.fb: * is used to multiple numbers in Java not the traditional x.

java.q: Which keyword keeps the main method from returning any value?
java.fb: void is the only one that works in this case.
